code: import{CONSTANTS}from"../actions";import uuid from"uuidv4";export var addCard=function addCard(listID,text){var id=uuid();return{type:CONSTANTS.ADD_CARD,payload:{text:text,listID:listID,id:id}};};export var editCard=function editCard(id,listID,newText){return{type:CONSTANTS.EDIT_CARD,payload:{id:id,listID:listID,newText:newText}};};export var deleteCard=function deleteCard(id,listID){return{type:CONSTANTS.DELETE_CARD,payload:{id:id,listID:listID}};};
